original: Himavantasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: 2. Kāyasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kāya sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 183. Tiṭṭhanti etenāti ṭhiti, kāraṇaṃ. Kammautucittāhārasaññito catubbidho paccayo
analyzed: tiṭṭhanti etena ati kāraṇam catubbidhaḥ paccayo

original: ṭhiti etassāti paccayaṭṭhitiko. Āhārapaccayasaddā hi ekatthā. Subhampīti kāmacchando
analyzed: etassa ati paccaya ṭṭhitikaḥ āhāra paccaya saddāḥ hi ekatthā subham pi iti kāmacchandaḥ

original: paccayo, asubhe subhākārena pavattanato subhanti vuccati. Tena kāraṇena pavattanakassa
analyzed: paccayaḥ asubhe subha ākārena pavattanato subhanti vuccati tena kāraṇena pavattanakassa

original: aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā subhanimittanti. Subhassāti yathāvuttassa subhassa.
analyzed: aññassa kāmacchandassa nimitta ttā subha nimittanti subhassa ati yathāvuttassa subhassa

original: Ārammaṇampīti subhākārena, iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇampi subhanimittaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇam pi iti subha ākārena iṭṭha ākārena vā gayhamānam rūpa ādi ārammaṇam pi subha nimittam

original: vuttākārena. Anupāyamanasikāroti ākaṅkhitassa hitasukhassa anupāyabhūto manasikāro,
analyzed: vutta ākārena anupāya manasikāro ti ākaṅkhitassa hita sukhassa anupāya bhūtaḥ manasikāro

original: tato eva uppathamanasikāroti ayonisomanasikāro. Tasminti yathāniddhārite kāmacchandabhūte
analyzed: tatas eva uppatha manasikāro ti a yonisaḥ manasikāro tasmin ti yathā niddhārite kāmacchanda bhūte

original: tadārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhepi subhanimitte. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “subhārammaṇe”icceva
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa bhūte ca duvidhe pi subha nimitte aṭṭhakathā ayam pana

original: vuttaṃ. Atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittantiādīti ādi-saddena kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa
analyzed: vuttam atthi bhikkhave subha nimittaṃ ti ādi iti ādi saddena kāmacchanda nīvaraṇassa

original: āhāradassanapāḷi uttānāti katvā vuttaṃ – “evaṃ sabbanīvaraṇesu yojanā veditabbā”ti.
analyzed: āhāra dassana pāḷi uttānā ti katvā vuttam evam sabba nīvaraṇesu yojanā veditabbā ti

original: Paṭighopi paṭighanimittaṃ purimuppannassa pacchā uppajjanakassa nimittabhāvato. Paṭighārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: paṭighaḥ api paṭigha nimittam purima uppannassa pacchā uppajjanakassa nimitta bhāvataḥ paṭigha ārammaṇam

original: nāma ekūnavīsati āghātavatthubhūtā sattasaṅkhārā. Aratīti pantasenāsanādīsu aramaṇaṃ.
analyzed: nāma ekūnavīsati āghāta vatthu bhūtā satta saṅkhārā arati iti panta senā āsana ādīsu

original: Ukkaṇṭhitāti ukkaṇṭhabhāvo. Pantesūti dūresu, vivittesu vā. Adhikusalesūti samathavipassanādhammesu.
analyzed: ukkaṇṭhitā ati ukkaṇṭha bhāvaḥ pantesu ti dūresu vivittesu vā adhi kusalesu ti samatha vipassanā dhammesu

original: Arati ratipaṭipakkho. Aratitāti aramaṇākāro. Anabhiratīti anabhiratabhāvo. Anabhiramaṇāti
analyzed: arati rati paṭipakkhaḥ a rati tā ati a ramaṇā ākāraḥ an abhirati iti an abhirata bhāvaḥ

original: anabhiramaṇākāro. Ukkaṇṭhitāti ukkaṇṭhanākāro. Paritassitāti ukkaṇṭhanavaseneva paritassanā.
analyzed: an abhiramaṇa ākāraḥ ukkaṇṭhitā ati ukkaṇṭhana ākāraḥ paritassitā ati ukkaṇṭhana vasena iva paritassanā

original: Āgantukaṃ, na sabhāvasiddhaṃ. Kāyālasiyanti nāmakāye alasabhāvo. Sammohavinodaniyaṃ
analyzed: āgantukam na sa bhāva siddham nāma kāye alasa bhāvaḥ

original: pana “tandīti jātiālasiya”nti vuttaṃ. Vadatīti etena atisītādipaccayā saṅkocāpattiṃ
analyzed: pana tandī iti jāti ālasiyanti vuttam vadati iti etena ati sīta ādi paccayā saṅkoca āpattiṃ

original: dasseti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ kilesavatthuvibhaṅge. Tandīti jātiālasiyaṃ. Tandiyanāti
analyzed: dasseti yam sandhāya vuttam kilesa vatthu vibhaṅge tandī iti jāti ālasiyam

original: tandiyanākāro. Tandimanakatāti tandiyā abhibhūtacittatā. Alasassa bhāvo ālasyaṃ.
analyzed: tandiya nākāraḥ tandiyā abhibhūta citta tā alasassa bhāvaḥ ālasyam

original: Ālasyāyanākāro ālasyāyanā. Ālasyāyitassa bhāvo ālasyāyitattaṃ. Iti sabbehipi imehi
analyzed: ālasyāyana ākāraḥ ālasyāyanā ālasyāyitassa bhāvaḥ ālasyāyitattam iti sabbehi pi imehi

original: padehi kilesavasena kāyālasiyaṃ kathitaṃ.
analyzed: padehi kilesa vasena kāyālasiyam kathitam

original: Kilesavasenāti sammohavasena. Kāyavinamanāti kāyassa virūpato namanā. Jambhanāti
analyzed: kilesa vasena ati sammoha vasena kāya vinamanā ati kāyassa virūpataḥ namanā jambhanā ati

original: phandanā. Punappunaṃ jambhanā vijambhanā. Ānamanāti purato namanā. Vinamanāti pacchato
analyzed: phandanā punappunam jambhanā vijambhanā ānamanā ati puratas namanā vinamanā ati pacchatas

original: namanā. Sannamanāti samantato namanā. Paṇamanāti yathā hi tantato uṭṭhitapesakāro
analyzed: namanā sannamanā ati samantataḥ namanā paṇamanā ati yathā hi tantataḥ uṭṭhita pesakāro

original: kiñcideva upariṭṭhitaṃ gahetvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ ussāpeti, evaṃ kāyassa uddhaṃ ṭhapanā.
analyzed: kiñcid eva upariṭṭhitam gahetvā ujum kāyam ussāpeti evam kāyassa uddham ṭhapanā

original: Byādhiyakanti uppannabyādhitā. Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyaphandanameva kathitaṃ.
analyzed: uppanna byādhitā iti sabbehi pi imehi padehi kilesa vasena kāya phandanam eva kathitam

original: Bhattapariḷāhoti bhattavasena pariḷāhuppatti. Bhuttāvissāti bhuttavato. Bhattamucchāti
analyzed: bhatta pariḷāho ti bhatta vasena pariḷāha uppatti bhutta avissāti bhuttavataḥ bhattam

original: bhattagelaññaṃ. Atibhuttapaccayā hi mucchāpatto viya hoti. Bhattakilamathoti bhuttapaccayā
analyzed: bhatta gelaññam ati bhutta paccayā hi mucchā pattaḥ viya hoti bhatta kilamatho ti bhutta paccayā

original: kilantabhāvo. Bhattapariḷāhoti bhattadaratho. Kucchipūraṃ bhuttavato hi pariḷāhuppattiyā
analyzed: kilanta bhāvaḥ bhatta pariḷāho ti kucchi pūram bhuttavataḥ hi pariḷāha uppattiyā

original: upahatindriyo viya hoti, kāyo khijjati. Kāyaduṭṭhullanti bhuttabhattaṃ nissāya kāyassa akammaññatā.
analyzed: upahata indriyaḥ viya hoti kāyaḥ khijjati bhutta bhattam nissāya kāyassa akammañña tā

original: Cittassa līyanākāroti ārammaṇe cittassa saṅkocappatti. Cittassa akalyatāti cittassa
analyzed: cittassa līyanā ākāro ti ārammaṇe cittassa saṅkoca ppatti cittassa cittassa

original: gilānabhāvo. Gilānoti akallako vuccati. Tathā cāha “nāhaṃ, bhante, akallako”ti. Akammaññatāti
analyzed: gilāna bhāvaḥ gilānaḥ ti akallakaḥ vuccati tathā ca āha na aham bhante akallakaḥ iti akammañña tā ati

original: cittagelaññasaṅkhāto akammaññanākāro. Olīyanāti olīyanākāro. Iriyāpathikampi cittaṃ
analyzed: citta gelañña saṅkhātaḥ a kammaññana ākāraḥ olīyanā ati olīyana ākāraḥ iriyāpathikam pi cittam

original: yassa vasena iriyāpathaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto olīyati, tassa taṃ ākāraṃ sandhāya
analyzed: yassa vasena iriyāpatham sandhāretum a sakkontaḥ olīyati tassa tam ākāram sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ “olīyanā”ti. Dutiyapadaṃ upasaggena vaḍḍhitaṃ. Līnanti avipphārikatāya saṅkocappattaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam olīyanā ti dutiya padam upasaggena vaḍḍhitam līnam ti a vipphārika tāya saṅkoca ppattam

original: Itare dve ākāraniddesā. Thinanti avipphārikatāya anussāhanā asaṅgahanasaṅgahanaṃ.
analyzed: itare dve ākāra niddesā anussāhanā a saṅgahana saṅgahanam

original: Thiyanākāro thiyanā. Thiyitattanti thiyitassa ākāro, avipphārikatāti attho.
analyzed: thiyan ākāraḥ thiyanā thiyitattanti thiyitassa ākāraḥ a vipphārika tā ati attho

original: Cetaso avūpasamoti cittassa avūpasantatā asannisinnabhāvo. Tenāha – “avūpasantākāro”ti.
analyzed: cetasaḥ avūpasamaḥ ti cittassa a vūpasanta tā a sannisinna bhāvo tena āha a vūpasanta ākāraḥ iti

original: Atthato panetanti svāyaṃ avūpasantākāro vikkhepasabhāvattā vikkhepahetutāya ca atthato
analyzed: atthataḥ pana itanti svāyam a vūpasanta ākāraḥ vikkhepa sabhāva ttā vikkhepa hetu tāya ca atthataḥ

original: etaṃ uddhaccakukkuccameva.
analyzed: etam uddhacca kukkuccam eva

original: Vicikicchāya ārammaṇadhammā nāma “buddhe kaṅkhatī”tiādinā āgataaṭṭhakaṅkhāvatthubhūtā
analyzed: vicikicchāyaḥ ārammaṇa dhammā nāma buddhe kaṅkhati iti ādinā āgata aṭṭha kaṅkhā vatthu bhūtā

original: dhammā. Yasmā vicikicchā byāpādādayo viya anu anu uggahaṇapaccayā uppajjati, tasmā
analyzed: dhammā yasmai vicikicchā byāpāda ādayaḥ viya anu anu uggahaṇa paccayā uppajjati tasmai

original: kaṅkhāṭṭhānīyaṃ ārammaṇameva dassitaṃ “vicikicchāya ārammaṇadhammā”ti. Yasmā purimuppannā
analyzed: kaṅkhā aṭṭhānīyam ārammaṇam eva dassitam vicikicchāyaḥ ārammaṇa dhammā ti yasmā purima uppannā

original: vicikicchā pacchā vicikicchāya paccayo hoti, tasmā vicikicchāpi vicikicchāṭṭhānīyadhammā
analyzed: vicikicchā pacchā vicikicchāya paccayaḥ hoti tasmā vicikicchā api vicikicchā aṭṭhānīya dhammā

original: veditabbā. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – tiṭṭhanti pavattanti etthāti ṭhānīyā, vicikicchā
analyzed: veditabbā tatra ayam vacana attho tiṭṭhanti pavattanti ettha ati ṭhānīyā vicikicchā

original: eva ṭhānīyā vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ārammaṇassapi tattha visesapaccayataṃ
analyzed: eva ṭhānīyā vicikicchā aṭṭhānīyā aṭṭhakathāyam pana ārammaṇassa pi tattha visesa paccaya tat

original: upādāya “kāmacchando vicikicchāti ime dve dhammā ārammaṇena kathitā”ti vuttaṃ. Subhanimittassa
analyzed: upādāya kāmacchandaḥ vicikicchā ati ime dve dhammā ārammaṇena kathitā ati vuttam subha nimittassa

original: hi paccayabhāvamattaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi yathā “paṭighampi paṭighanimitta”nti
analyzed: hi paccaya bhāva mattam sandhāya itam vuttam tathā api yathā paṭigham pi paṭigha nimittan ti

original: katvā “byāpādo upanissayena kathito”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ subhampi subhanimittanti katvā
analyzed: katvā byāpādaḥ upanissayena kathito ti vuttam evam subham pi subha nimittan ti katvā

original: kāmacchando upanissayena kathitoti sakkā viññātuṃ. Sesā thinamiddhauddhaccakukkuccāni.
analyzed: kāmacchandaḥ upanissayena kathito ti sakkā viññātum sesā thinamiddha auddhacca kukkuccāni

original: Tattha thinamiddhaṃ aññamaññaṃ sahajātādivasena paccayo, tathā uddhaccakukkuccanti.
analyzed: tattha thinam iddham aññam aññam sahajāta ādi vasena paccayaḥ tathā uddhacca kukkuccanti

original: Ubhayesampi upanissayakoṭiyā paccayabhāve vattabbameva natthīti āha “sahajātena ca upanissayena cā”ti.
analyzed: ubhayesam pi upanissaya koṭiyā paccaya bhāve vattabbam eva natthi iti āha sahajātena ca upanissayena ca ati

original: Yasmā sati nāma “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anussaraṇavasena
analyzed: yasmā satī nāma cattāro sati paṭṭhāna ati ādinā tesam tesam dhammānam anussaraṇa vasena

original: vattati, tasmā te dhammā satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā nāma. Lokuttaradhamme ca anussavādivasena
analyzed: vattati tasmā te dhammā sati sambojjhaṅga ṭṭhānīyāḥ nāma lokuttara dhamme ca anussava ādi vasena

original: gahetvā tathā pavattateva. Tena vuttaṃ “satiyā”tiādi.
analyzed: gahetvā tathā pavatta tā iva tena vuttam satiyā itiādi

original: Kosallaṃ vuccati paññā, tato uppannā kosallasambhūtā. Anavajjasukhavipākāti anavajjā
analyzed: kosallam vuccati paññā tatas uppannā kosalla sambhūtā anavajja sukha vipākā ati anavajjā

original: hutvā sukhavipākā vipaccanakā. Padadvayena paccayato sabhāvato kiccato phalato kusaladhammaṃ
analyzed: hutvā sukha vipākā vipaccanakā pada dvayena paccayataḥ sabhāvataḥ kiccataḥ phalataḥ kusala dhammam

original: dasseti. Akusalaniddesepi eseva nayo. Sāvajjāti gārayhā. Anavajjāti agārayhā. Hīnā
analyzed: dasseti akusala niddese pi esā iva nayo sāvajjā ati gārayhā anavajjā ati agārayhā hīnā

original: lāmakā. Paṇītā seṭṭhā. Kaṇhā kāḷakā asuddhā. Sukkā odātā suddhā. Paṭibhāga-saddo
analyzed: lāmakā paṇītā seṭṭhā kaṇhā kāḷakā asuddhā sukkā odātā suddhā paṭibhāga saddo

original: paṭhame vikappe sadisakoṭṭhāsattho, dutiye paṭipakkhakoṭṭhāsattho, tatiye niggahetabbapaṭipakkhakoṭṭhāsattho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: paṭhame vikappe sadisa koṭṭhāsa attho dutiye paṭipakkha koṭṭhāsa attho tatiye niggahetabba paṭipakkha koṭṭhāsa attho daṭṭhabbo

original: Kusalakiriyāya ādikammabhāvena pavattavīriyaṃ dhitisabhāvatāya dhātūti vuttanti āha
analyzed: kusala kiriyāya ādi kamma bhāvena pavatta vīriyam dhiti sabhāva tāya dhātu uti vuttan ti āha

original: “ārambhadhātūti paṭhamārambhavīriya”nti. Laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ hutvā
analyzed: ārambha dhātu uti laddha āsevanam vīriyam bala ppattam hutvā

original: paṭipakkhaṃ vidhamatīti āha – “nikkamadhātūti kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavatara”nti.
analyzed: paṭipakkham vidhamati iti āha nikkama dhātu uti kosajjataḥ nikkhanta ttā tatas balavataranti

original: Adhimattādhimattatarānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vidhamanasamatthaṃ paṭupaṭutarādibhāvappattaṃ
analyzed: adhimatta adhimattatarānam paṭipakkha dhammānam vidhamana samattham paṭu paṭutara ādi bhāva ppattam

original: hotīti āha – “parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanatāya tatopi balavatara”nti.
analyzed: āha

original: Tiṭṭhati pavattati etthāti ṭhānīyā. Ārammaṇadhammā, pītisambojjhaṅgassa ṭhānīyāti
analyzed: tiṭṭhati pavattati ettha ati ṭhānīyāḥ ārammaṇa dhammā pīti sambojjhaṅgassa ṭhānīyā ati

original: pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyāti “pītiyā ārammaṇadhammā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā aparāparuppattiyā
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅga ṭṭhānīyā āti pītiyāḥ ārammaṇa dhammā ti vuttam yasmai apara apara uppattiyā

original: pītipi tathā vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ visuddhimagge “pītiyā eva taṃ nāma”nti.
analyzed: tathā vattabba tam labhati iti vuttam visuddhimagge pītiyāḥ eva tam nāman ti

original: Darathapassaddhīti daratho kilesapariḷāho, so passambhati etāyāti darathapassaddhi,
analyzed: daratha passaddhi iti darathaḥ kilesa pariḷāhaḥ saḥ passambhati etāyāti daratha passaddhi

original: kāyapassaddhiyā vedanādikhandhattayassa viya rūpakāyassapi passambhanaṃ hoti, cittapassaddhiyā
analyzed: kāya passaddhiyā vedanā ādi khandha ttayassa viya rūpa kāyassa api passambhanam hoti citta passaddhiyā

original: cittasseva passambhanaṃ, tato evettha bhagavatā lahutādīnaṃ viya duvidhatā vuttā.
analyzed: cittassa iva passambhanam tatas evā ittha bhagavatā lahu tā ādīnam viya duvidha tā vuttā

original: Tathā samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā gayhamāno samathova samathanimittaṃ, tassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ
analyzed: tathā samāhita ākāram sat lakkhetvā gayhamāno samathaḥ uva samatha nimittam tassa ārammaṇa bhūtam

original: paṭibhāganimittampi. Vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo. Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso

original: bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno vutto. Ekaggabhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti abyaggo, samādhi, so
analyzed: bhanta tā paccupaṭṭhānaḥ vuttaḥ ekagga bhāvataḥ byagga paṭipakkho ti abyaggaḥ samādhi so

original: eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha “tasseva vevacana”nti.
analyzed: eva nimittam ti pubbe viya vattabbam tena āha tassa iva vevacanam ti

original: Yo ārammaṇe iṭṭhāniṭṭhākāraṃ anādiyitvā gahetabbo majjhattākāro, yo ca pubbe upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa
analyzed: yaḥ ārammaṇe iṭṭha aniṭṭha ākāram an ādiyitvā gahetabbaḥ majjhatta ākāraḥ yaḥ ca pubbe upekkhā sambojjhaṅgassa

original: bhāvanāvasena uppanno majjhattākāro, duvidhopi so upekkhāya ārammaṇadhammoti adhippetoti
analyzed: bhāvanā vasena uppannaḥ majjhatta ākāraḥ duvidhaḥ pi saḥ upekkhāya ārammaṇa dhammo ti adhippeto ti

original: āha – “atthato pana majjhattākāro upekkhāṭṭhānīyā dhammāti veditabbo”ti. Ārammaṇena
analyzed: āha atthataḥ pana majjhatta ākāraḥ upekkhā ṭhānīyāḥ dhammā ti veditabbaḥ ti ārammaṇena

original: kathitā ārammaṇasseva tesaṃ visesapaccayabhāvato. Sesāti vīriyādayo cattāro dhammā.
analyzed: kathitāḥ ārammaṇassa iva tesam visesa paccaya bhāvato sesā ati vīriya ādayo cattāro dhammā

original: Tesañhi upanissayova sātisayo icchitabboti.
analyzed: tesam hi upanissayaḥ va sa atisayaḥ icchitabbaḥ ti

original: Kāyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kāya sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 3. Sīlasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sīla sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 184. Khīṇāsavassa lokuttaraṃ sīlaṃ nāma maggaphalapariyāpannā sammāvācākammantājīvā
analyzed: khīṇāsavassa lokuttaram sīlam nāma magga phala pariyāpannā sammā vācā kammanta ājīvā

original: sīlalakkhaṇappattā tadaññe cetanādayo. Lokiyaṃ pana kiriyābyākatacittapariyāpannaṃ

original: ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu

original: vuttanayena saṃvegajananavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā,

original: saṃvegajananapubbakapasāduppādanena bhāvanācittassa tosanātiattho.

original: Alīnantiādīsu kosajjapakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya alīnaṃ, uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ

original: anuddhatāya ca niggahe, anirassādatāya sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ āpajjati. Alīnānuddhaccatāhi

original: Tenāha – “te panā”tiādi, te pana bhikkhūti attho. Puna te panāti titthiyā titthiyasāvakā ca.
analyzed: tena āha te pana atiādi te pana bhikkhū iti attho puna te pana ati titthiyā titthiya sāvakā ca

original: Imasmiṃ paññāpaneti “pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyā”tiādinayappavatte imasmiṃ pakāre atthapaññāpane.

original: Visissati aññamaññato pabhijjatīti viseso, bhedo. Svāyaṃ idha antogadhādhikabhāvo
analyzed: visissati aññam aññatas pabhijjati iti visesaḥ bhedo antogadha adhika bhāvaḥ

original: adhippetoti āha – “ko visesoti kiṃ adhika”nti. Adhikaṃ payasanaṃ payuñjananti adhippayāso,
analyzed: adhippetaḥ iti āha kaḥ visesaḥ iti kim adhikam ti adhikam payasanam payuñjanam ti adhippayāsaḥ

original: adhikappayogo. Nānā karīyati etenāti nānākaraṇaṃ, bhedoti āha – “kiṃ nānatta”nti.

original: Dutiyapadeti “anusāsaniyā vā anusāsani”nti etasmiṃ pade. Eseva nayoti yathā paṭhamasmiṃ

original: Kiñcāpi sabbaṃ vīriyaṃ cetasikameva, yaṃ pana kāyakammādhiṭṭhānādivasena manasi kāyikapayogasamuṭṭhāpanaṃ

analyzed: paṭikūlā iti virajjati iti paṭikūlam aniṭṭham na paṭikūlam a paṭikūlam iṭṭham tena āha

analyzed: deva gati saṃvatta niyata ādi tad bhedassa kaṇha sukka vipāka nānattassa diṭṭha dhamma vedanīya tā ādi tad bhedassa

original: parittabhūmakādikiriyānānattassa, tihetukāditabbhedassa vasena anupassitabbanti yojanā.
analyzed: paritta bhūmaka ādi kiriyā nānattassa ti hetuka ādi tad bhedassa vasena anupassitabbanti yojanā

original: Ādi-saddena savatthukāvatthukādinānattassa puggalattayasādhāraṇāditabbhedassa ca

original: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sarāgādīnanti mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte āgatānaṃ sarāgavītarāgādibhedānaṃ.
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo sa rāga ādīnam ti mahāsatipaṭṭhāna sutte āgatānam sa rāga vīta rāga ādi bhedānam

original: Salakkhaṇa-sāmaññalakkhaṇānanti phusanāditaṃtaṃsalakkhaṇānañceva aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇānañca vasenāti yojanā.
analyzed: sa lakkhaṇa sāmañña lakkhaṇānam ti phusana ādi taṃtaṃsa lakkhaṇānam ca iva anicca tā ādi sāmañña lakkhaṇānam ca vasena ati yojanā

original: Suññatadhammassāti anattatāsaṅkhātasuññatasabhāvassa. “Salakkhaṇa-sāmaññalakkhaṇāna”nti
analyzed: suññata dhammassa ati anatta tā saṅkhāta suññata sabhāvassa salakkhaṇa sāmañña lakkhaṇānaṃ ti

original: hi iminā yo ito bāhirakehi sāminivāsīkārakavedakaadhiṭṭhāyakabhāvena parikappito
analyzed: hi iminā yaḥ itas bāhirakehi sāmi nivāsīkāraka vedaka adhiṭṭhāyaka bhāvena parikappito

original: attā, tassa saṅkhāresu niccatā sukhatā viya katthacipi abhāvo vibhāvito. Natthi etesaṃ
analyzed: attā tassa saṅkhāresu nicca tā sukha tā viya katthaci pi abhāvaḥ vibhāvitaḥ natthi etesam

original: attāti anattā, yasmā pana saṅkhāresu ekadhammopi attā na hoti, tasmā te na attātipi
analyzed: attā ati anattā yasmā pana saṅkhāresu eka dhammaḥ api attā na hoti tasmā te na attā atipi

original: anattāti ayaṃ tesaṃ suññatadhammo. Tassa suññatadhammassa, yaṃ vibhāvetuṃ abhidhamme
analyzed: anattā ati ayam tesam suññata dhammo tassa suññata dhammassa yam vibhāvetum abhidhamme

original: “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī”tiādinā suññatavāradesanā vuttā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: tasmin kho pana samaye dhammā honti iti ādinā suññata vāra desanā vuttā sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Ambapālisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ambapāli sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 2. Satisuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sati sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 368. Saratīti sato. Ayaṃ pana na yāya kāyaci satiyā sato, atha kho edisāyāti dassento
analyzed: sarati iti sataḥ ayam pana na yāya kāyaci satiyā sataḥ atha kho edisāya ati dassento

original: “kāyādianupassanāsatiyā”ti āha. Catusampajaññapaññāyāti catubbidhasampajaññapaññāya,
analyzed: kāya ādi anupassanā satiyā ti āha catu sampajañña paññāya ti catubbidha sampajañña paññāya

original: abhikkamanaṃ abhikkantanti āha – “abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamana”nti. Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ
analyzed: abhikkamanam abhikkantanti āha abhikkantam vuccati gamanan ti tathā paṭikkamanam

original: paṭikkantanti vuttaṃ – “paṭikkantaṃ nivattana”nti. Nivattanañca nivattimattaṃ, nivattitvā

original: dassento “ṭhānepī”tiādimāha. Āsanassāti pīṭhakādiāsanassa. Purimaaṅgābhimukhoti aṭanikādipurimāvayavābhimukho.
analyzed: dassentaḥ ṭhāne pi itiādim āha āsanassa ati pīṭhaka ādi āsanassa purima aṅga abhimukhaḥ ti aṭanikā ādi purima avayava abhimukhaḥ

original: Saṃsarantoti saṃsappanto. Paccāsaṃsarantoti paṭiāsappanto. Eseva nayoti iminā sarīrasseva
analyzed: saṃsarantaḥ iti saṃsappantaḥ paccā saṃsarantaḥ ti paṭiāsappantaḥ esā iva nayo ti iminā sarīrassa iva

original: abhimukhasaṃsappanapaṭiāsappanāni nidasseti.
analyzed: abhimukha saṃsappana paṭiāsappanāni nidasseti

original: Sammā pajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ. Tena attanā kātabbakiccassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti
analyzed: sammā pajānanam sampajānam tena attanā kātabba kiccassa karaṇa sīlo sampajāna kārī iti

original: āha – “sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī”ti. Sampajānameva hi sampajaññaṃ. Sampajaññasseva
analyzed: āha sampajaññena sabba kicca kārī iti sampajānam eva hi sampajaññam sampajaññassa iva

original: vā kārīti sampajaññasseva karaṇasīlo. Sampajaññaṃ karotevāti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ

original: uppādeti eva, sampajānasseva vā kāro etassa atthīti sampajānakārī.
analyzed: uppādeti eva sampajānassa iva vā kāraḥ etassa atthi iti sampajāna kārī

original: Dhammato vaḍḍhitasaṅkhātena saha atthena vattatīti sātthakaṃ, abhikkantādi, sātthakassa
analyzed: dhammataḥ vaḍḍhita saṅkhātena saha atthena vattati iti sātthakam abhikkanta ādi sātthakassa

original: sampajānanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Sappāyassa attano upakārāvahassa hitassa sampajānanaṃ
analyzed: sampajānanam sātthaka sampajaññam sappāyassa attanaḥ upakāra āvahassa hitassa sampajānanam

original: sappāyasampajaññaṃ. Abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare, aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite
analyzed: sappāya sampajaññam abhikkama ādīsu bhikkhā ācāra gocare aññattha api ca pavattesu a vijahite

original: kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ. Abhikkamādīsu asammuyhanameva
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna saṅkhāte gocare sampajaññam gocara sampajaññam abhikkama ādīsu a sammuyhanam eva

original: sampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Pariggaṇhitvāti tulayitvā tīretvā, paṭisaṅkhāyāti
analyzed: sampajaññam a sammoha sampajaññam pariggaṇhitvā ati tulayitvā tīretvā paṭisaṅkhāya ati

original: attho. Saṅghadassaneneva uposathapavāraṇādiatthaṃ gamanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Asubhadassanādīti
analyzed: attho saṅgha dassanena iva uposatha pavāraṇa ādi attham gamanam saṅgahitam asubha dassana ādi iti

original: ādi-saddena kasiṇaparikammādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ
analyzed: ādi saddena kasiṇa parikamma ādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo saṅkhepataḥ vuttam attham vivaritum

original: “cetiyaṃ disvāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso eso. Samathavipassanuppādanampi
analyzed: cetiyam disvā api hi itiādi vuttam arahattam pāpuṇāti iti ukkaṭṭha niddesaḥ eso samatha vipassana uppādanam pi

original: hi bhikkhuno vuddhi eva. Dakkhiṇadvāreti cetiyaṅgaṇassa dakkhiṇadvāre, tathā pacchimadvāretiādīsu.
analyzed: hi bhikkhuno vuddhi eva dakkhiṇa dvāra iti cetiyaṅgaṇassa dakkhiṇa dvāre tathā pacchima dvāra iti ādīsu

original: Abhayavāpi pāḷiyanti abhayavāpiyā puratthimatīre.
analyzed: abhayavāpi pāḷiyanti abhayavāpiyā puratthima tīre

original: Buddhavaṃsa-ariyavaṃsa-cetiyavaṃsa-dīpavaṃsādivaṃsakathanato mahāariyavaṃsabhāṇako

original: thero. Paññāyanaṭṭhāneti cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne. Ekapaduddhāreti paduddhārapatiṭṭhānaparivattanaṃ
analyzed: thero paññāyana ṭhāne iti cetiyassa paññāyana ṭhāne eka paduddhāre iti paduddhāra patiṭṭhāna parivattanam

original: Tasmiṃ panāti sātthakasampajaññavasena pariggahitaatthepi gamane. Attho nāma dhammato
analyzed: tasmin pana ati sātthaka sampajañña vasena pariggahita atthe api gamane atthaḥ nāma dhammataḥ

original: vaḍḍhīti yaṃ sātthakanti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ, taṃ sappāyamevāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti

original: tannivattanatthaṃ “cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Cittakammarūpakāni viyāti

original: cittakammakatā paṭimāyo viya, yantapayogena vā vicittakammā paṭimāya sadisā yantarūpakā

analyzed: viya asamapekkhanam geha sita aññāṇupekkhā vasena ārammaṇe ayonisaḥ olokana ādi yaṃ

original: Hatthiādisammaddena jīvitantarāyo. Visabhāgarūpadassanādinā brahmacariyantarāyo.
analyzed: hatthi ādi sammaddena jīvita antarāyaḥ visa bhāga rūpa dassana ādinā brahmacariya antarāyaḥ

original: Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ anuvattanakathā āciṇṇā, ananuvattanakathā pana

analyzed: tassāḥ aparā dutiyā nāma hoti iti āha dve kathā nāma na kathita pubbā ati evam ti iminā

original: Yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuccatīti āha “kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: yoga kammassa pavatti ṭṭhāna tāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇam kammaṭṭhānam vuccati iti āha kammaṭṭhāna saṅkhātam

original: gocara”nti. Uggahetvāti yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ uggahakosallassa sampādanavasena uggahetvā.

original: Haratīti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pavatteti, yāva piṇḍapātapaṭikkamā anuyuñjatīti attho. Na paccāharatīti

analyzed: sammā ādiyitvā tesam vattānam paripūraṇa vasena vattati sarīra parikammanti mukha dhovana ādi sarīra paṭijagganam

original: Dve tayo pallaṅketi dve tayo nisajjāvāre dve tīṇi uṇhāsanāni. Tenāha – “usumaṃ gāhāpento”ti.
analyzed: dve tayo pallaṅkā iti dve tayaḥ nisajja āvāre dve tīṇi uṇhāsanāni tena āha usumam gāhāpento ti

original: Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti kammaṭṭhānamukheneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto eva. Tena “pattopi
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna sīsena iva ati kammaṭṭhāna mukhena iva kammaṭṭhānam a vijahantaḥ eva tena patto pi

original: acetano”tiādinā pavattetabbakammaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāparihariyamānaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahitvāti
analyzed: acetanā iti ādinā pavattetabba kammaṭṭhānam yathā parihariyamānam vā kammaṭṭhānam a vijahitvā iti

original: dasseti. Tathevāti tikkhattumeva. Paribhogacetiyato sarīracetiyaṃ garutaranti katvā
analyzed: dasseti tathā iva ati tikkhattum eva paribhoga cetiyataḥ sarīra cetiyam katvā

original: “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti cetiyavandanāya paṭhamaṃ karaṇīyatā vuttā. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: cetiyam vanditvā iti cetiya vandanāya paṭhamam karaṇīya tā vuttā tathā hi aṭṭhakathā ayam

original: – “cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā bodhisākhā haritabbā”ti vuttā. Buddhaguṇānussaraṇavaseneva
analyzed: cetiyam bādhayamānā bodhisākhā haritabbā iti vuttā buddha guṇa anussaraṇa vasena iva

original: bodhiñca paṇipātakaraṇanti āha – “buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ
analyzed: bodhim ca paṇipāta karaṇan ti āha buddhassa bhagavataḥ sammukhā viya nipaccakāram

original: dassetvā”ti. Gāmasamīpeti gāmassa upacāraṭṭhāne.
analyzed: dassetvā ati gāma samīpe iti gāmassa upacāra ṭhāne

original: Janasaṅgahaṇatthanti “mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī”ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ.
analyzed: jana saṅgahaṇa attham ti mayi a kathente etesam kaḥ kathessati iti dhamma anuggahena jana saṅgahaṇa attham

original: Tasmāti yasmā “dhammakathā nāma kathetabbā evā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti, yasmā
analyzed: tasmā iti yasmā dhamma kathā nāma kathetabbā evā ti aṭṭhakathā cariyāḥ vadanti yasmā

original: ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā. Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti attanā

original: parihariyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto tadanuguṇaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathetvā. Anumodanaṃ
analyzed: parihariyamānam kammaṭṭhānam a vijahanto tad anuguṇam yeva dhamma katham kathetvā anumodanam

original: katvāti etthāpi “kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Sampattaparicchedenevāti

original: paricito aparicitotiādivibhāgaṃ akatvā sampattakoṭiyā eva, samāgamamattenevāti attho.
analyzed: paricitaḥ a paricitaḥ iti ādi vibhāgam a katvā sampatta koṭiyā eva samāgama mattena iva ati attho

original: Bhayeti paracakkādibhaye.
analyzed: bhaya iti para cakka ādi bhaye

original: Kammajatejoti gahaṇiṃ sandhāyāha. Kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ nārohati khudāparissamena kilantakāyattā
analyzed: kamma ja tejaḥ ti gahaṇim sandhāya āha kammaṭṭhāna vīthim na ārohati khudā parissamena kilantaka āyattā

original: samādhānābhāvato. Avasesaṭṭhāneti yāguyā aggahitaṭṭhāne. Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti kammaṭṭhānupaṭṭhānassa
analyzed: samādhāna abhāvataḥ avasesa ṭṭhāne iti yāguyā agga hita ṭṭhāne poṅkha anupoṅkhanti kammaṭṭhāna upaṭṭhānassa

original: aviccheda-dassanametaṃ, yathā poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ pavattāya sarapaṭipāṭiyā anavicchedo,
analyzed: a viccheda dassanam etam yathā poṅkha anupoṅkham pavattāya sara paṭipāṭiyā an avicchedaḥ

original: evametassapi kammaṭṭhānupaṭṭhānassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: evam etassa api kammaṭṭhāna upaṭṭhānassa ati vuttam hoti

original: Nikkhittadhuro bhāvanānuyoge. Vattapaṭipattiyā apūraṇena sabbavattāni bhinditvā.
analyzed: nikkhitta dhuraḥ bhāvanā anuyoge vatta paṭipattiyā a pūraṇena sabba vattāni bhinditvā

original: Kāme avītarāgo hoti. Kāye avītarāgo. Rūpe avītarāgo. Yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehaṃ bhuñjitvā
analyzed: kāme a vīta rāgaḥ kāye a vīta rāgaḥ rūpe a vīta rāgaḥ yāvadattham udara avadeham bhuñjitvā

original: seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati. Aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya
analyzed: seyya sukham passa sukham middha sukham anuyuttaḥ viharati aññataram devanikāyam paṇidhāya

original: brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ pañcavidhacetovinibandhacitto. Caritvāti pavattitvā.
analyzed: brahmacariyam carati iti evam vuttam caritvā ati pavattitvā

original: Gatapaccāgatikavattavasenāti bhāvanāsahitaṃyeva bhikkhāya gatapaccāgataṃ gamanapaccāgamanaṃ
analyzed: gatapaccāgatika vatta vasena ati bhāvanā sahitam yeva bhikkhāya gata paccāgatam gamana paccāgamanam

original: etassa atthīti gatapaccāgatikaṃ, tadeva vattaṃ, tassa vasena. Attano hitasukhaṃ kāmenti
analyzed: etassa atthi iti gata paccāgatikam tat eva vattam tassa vasena attanaḥ hita sukham kāmenti

original: icchantīti attakāmā, dhammacchandavanto. “Dhammo”ti hi hitaṃ taṃnimittakañca sukhanti.
analyzed: icchanti iti atta kāmāḥ dhamma chandavantaḥ hi hitam tad nimittakam ca sukhanti

original: Atha vā viññūnaṃ dhammānaṃ attaniyattā attabhāvaparicchannattā ca attā nāma dhammo.

original: indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramippatto, teneva naṃ satthā – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
analyzed: indriya saṃvare ukkaṃsa pārami patto tena iva nam satthā etat aggam bhikkhave mama

original: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
analyzed: sāvakānam bhikkhūnam indriyesu gutta dvārānam yat idam nando ti etad agge ṭhapesi

original: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā ālokitavilokitassāti ānetvā sambandho. Tasmāti
analyzed: sa atthaka tā ca sappāya tā ca veditabbā ālokita vilokitassa ati ānetvā sambandhaḥ tasmā ati

original: kammaṭṭhānāvijahanasseva gocarasampajaññabhāvatoti vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna avijahanassa iva gocara sampajañña bhāvato ti vuttam evattham hetu bhāvena paccāmasati

original: Attano kammaṭṭhānavaseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ, khandhādikammaṭṭhānikehi añño
analyzed: attanaḥ kammaṭṭhāna vasena iva ālokana vilokanam kātabbam khandha ādi kammaṭṭhānikehi aññaḥ

original: upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo. Yasmā ālokitādisamaññāpi dhammamattasseva pavattiviseso,
analyzed: upāyaḥ na gavesitabbaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ yasmai ālokita ādi samaññā api dhamma mattassa iva pavatti viseso

original: tasmā tassa yāthāvato pajānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ “abbhantare”tiādi
analyzed: tasmā tassa yāthāvataḥ pajānanam a sammoha sampajaññanti dassetum abbhantara itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasenāti kiriyamayacittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātuyā
analyzed: vuttam citta kiriya vāyodhātu vipphāra vasena ati kiriya maya citta samuṭṭhāna vāyodhātuyā

original: calanākārapavattivasena. Adho sīdatīti thokaṃ otarati. Uddhaṃ laṅghetīti laṅghantaṃ
analyzed: calana ākāra pavatti vasena adhas sīdati iti thokam otarati uddham laṅgheti iti laṅghantam

original: viya upari gacchati.
analyzed: viyaḥ upari gacchati

original: Aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānanti padhānabhūtaṃ aṅgakiccaṃ nipphādentaṃ, upapattibhavassa
analyzed: aṅga kiccam sādhayamānanti padhāna bhūtam aṅga kiccam nipphādentam upapatti bhavassa

original: sarīraṃ hutvāti attho. Paṭhamajavanepi…pe… sattamajavanepi na hotīti idaṃ pañcadvāraviññāṇavīthiyaṃ
analyzed: sarīram hutvā ti na hoti iti idam pañca dvāra viññāṇa vīthiyam

original: “itthī puriso”ti rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ
analyzed: itthī purisaḥ iti rajjana ādīnam abhāvam sandhāya vuttam tattha hi āvajjana voṭṭhabbanānam

original: ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobhamattaṃ, aniṭṭhe paṭighamattaṃ
analyzed: ayonisas āvajjana voṭṭhabbana vasena iṭṭhe itthi rūpa ādimhi lobha mattam aniṭṭhe paṭigha mattam

original: uppajjati. Manodvāre pana “itthī puriso”ti rajjanādi hoti, tassa pañcadvārajavanaṃ
analyzed: uppajjati manaḥ dvāre pana itthī puriso ti rajjana ādi hoti tassa pañca dvāra javanam

original: mūlaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ vā sabbaṃ bhavaṅgādi. Evaṃ manodvārajavanassa mūlabhūtadhammaparijānanavaseneva
analyzed: mūlam yathā vuttam vā sabbam bhavaṅga ādi evam manaḥ dvāra javanassa mūla bhūta dhamma parijānana vasena iva

original: mūlapariññā vuttā, āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena
analyzed: mūla pariññā vuttā āgantuka tā avakālika tā pana pañca dvāra javanassa iva apubba bhāva vasena

original: ceva ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā. Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesūti heṭṭhimassa
analyzed: ca iva ittara bhāva vasena ca vuttā heṭṭhu pariya vasena bhijjitvā patitesu iti heṭṭhimassa

original: uparimassa ca aparāparaṃ bhaṅgappattimāha.
analyzed: uparimassa ca apara aparam bhaṅga ppattim āha

original: Tanti javanaṃ. Tassa javanassa na yuttanti sambandho. Āgantuko abbhāgato. Udayabbayaparicchinno tāvatako kālo etesanti tāvakālikāni.
analyzed: tanti javanam tassa javanassa na yuttanti sambandhaḥ āgantukaḥ abbhāgataḥ udaya bbaya paricchinno tāvatakaḥ kālaḥ etesanti tāvakālikāni

original: Etaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Samavāyeti sāmaggiyaṃ. Tatthāti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokane
analyzed: etam a sammoha sampajaññam samavāya iti sāmaggiyam tattha āti pañca kkhandha vasena ālokana vilokane

original: paññāyamāne tabbinimutto – ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi. Upanissayapaccayoti idaṃ
analyzed: paññāyamāne tad binimuttaḥ kaḥ ekaḥ āloketi kaḥ viloketi upanissaya paccayo ti idam

original: suttantanayena pariyāyato vuttaṃ. Sahajātapaccayoti nidassanamattametaṃ aññamaññasampayuttaatthiavigatādipaccayānampi labbhanato.
analyzed: suttanta nayena pariyāyataḥ vuttam sahajāta paccayaḥ ti nidassanamattam etam aññam añña sampayutta atthi avigata ādi paccayānam pi labbhanato

original: Kāleti samiñjituṃ yuttakāle samiñjantassa, tathā pasāretuṃ yuttakāle pasārentassa. “Maṇisappo nāma ekā sappajātī”ti vadanti. Laḷananti kampanaṃ, līḷākaraṇaṃ vā.
analyzed: kāleti samiñjitum yutta kāle samiñjantassa tathā pasāretum yutta kāle pasārentassa maṇisappaḥ nāma ekā sappa jātī iti vadanti laḷanam ati kampanam līḷā karaṇam vā

original: Uṇhapakatiko pariḷāhabahulakāyo. Sīlassa vidūsanena ahitāvahattā micchājīvavasena
analyzed: uṇha pakatiko pariḷāha bahula kāyo sīlassa vidūsanena ahita āvaha tā micchājīva vasena

original: uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ. “Cīvarampi acetana”ntiādinā cīvarassa viya kāyopi acetanoti kāyassa
analyzed: uppannam asappāyam cīvaram pi acetana nti ādinā cīvarassa viya kāyaḥ api acetanoti kāyassa

original: attasuññatāvibhāvanena “abbhantare”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ paridīpento itarītarasantosassa
analyzed: atta suñña tā vibhāvanena abbhantara iti ādinā vuttam eva attham paridīpentaḥ itarītara santosassa

original: kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi.
analyzed: kāraṇam tena āha tasmā itiādi

original: Catupañcagaṇṭhikāhatoti āhatacatupañcagaṇṭhiko, catupañcagaṇṭhikāhi vā hatasobho.
analyzed: catu pañca gaṇṭhikā āhataḥ iti āhata catu pañca gaṇṭhikaḥ vā

original: Aṭṭhavidhopi atthoti aṭṭhavidhopi payojanaviseso. Mahāsivattheravādavasena “imassa
analyzed: aṭṭhavidhaḥ api attho ti aṭṭhavidhaḥ api payojana visesaḥ mahā siva thera vāda vasena imassa

original: kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā nayena vutto daṭṭhabbo. Imasmiṃ pakkhe “neva davāyātiādinā
analyzed: kāyassa ṭhitiyā iti ādinā nayena vuttaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ imasmin pakkhe na iva davāya ati ādinā

original: nayenā”ti pana idaṃ paṭikkhepaṅgadassanamukhena pāḷi āgatāti katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: nayena āti pana idam paṭikkhepa aṅga dassana mukhena āgatā iti katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: Pathavīsandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātuyāva
analyzed: pathavī sandhāraka jalassa tad sandhāraka vāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa

original: āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha – “vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhatī”ti. Atiharatīti yāva mukhā abhiharati.
analyzed: āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha vāyo dhātu vasena iva tiṭṭhati iti atiharati iti yāva mukhā abhiharati

original: Vītiharatīti tato kucchiyaṃ vimissaṃ karonto harati. Atiharatīti vā mukhadvāraṃ atikkāmento
analyzed: vītiharati iti tatas kucchiyam vimissam karontaḥ harati atiharati iti vā mukha dvāram atikkāmento

original: harati. Vītiharatīti kucchigataṃ passato harati. Parivattetīti aparāparaṃ cāreti.
analyzed: harati vītiharati iti kucchi gatam passataḥ harati parivatteti iti apara aparam cāreti

original: Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasañcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu
analyzed: ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇa parivattana sañcuṇṇana visosanāni pathavī dhātu sahitā eva vāyo dhātu

original: karoti, na kevalāti tāni pathavīdhātuyā kiccabhāvena vuttāni, sā eva dhāraṇādīni
analyzed: karoti na kevalā ti tāni pathavī dhātuyā kicca bhāvena vuttāni eva dhāraṇā ādīni

original: kiccāni karontassa sādhāraṇāti vuttāni. Allattañca anupāletīti yathā vāyodhātuādīhi
analyzed: kiccāni karontassa vuttāni anupāleti iti yathā vāyodhātu ādīhi

original: aññehi visosanaṃ na hoti, tathā anupāleti allabhāvaṃ. Tejodhātūti gahaṇīsaṅkhātā
analyzed: aññehi visosanam na hoti tathā anupāla iti alla bhāvam tejaḥ dhātu iti gahaṇī saṅkhātā

original: tejodhātu. Sā hi antopaviṭṭhaṃ āhāraṃ paripāceti. Añjaso hotīti āhārassa pavisanādīnaṃ
analyzed: tejaḥ dhātu sā hi anta upaviṭṭham āhāram paripāceti añjasas hoti iti āhārassa pavisana ādīnam

original: maggo hoti. Ābhujatīti pariyesanavasena, ajjhoharaṇajiṇṇājiṇṇatādipaṭisaṃvedanavasena
analyzed: maggaḥ hoti ābhujati iti pariyesana vasena ajjhoharaṇa jiṇṇa ajiṇṇa tā ādi paṭisaṃvedana vasena

original: ca āvajjeti, vijānātīti attho. Taṃtaṃvijānanassa paccayabhūtoyeva hi payogo “sammāpayogo”ti
analyzed: ca āvajjeti vijānāti iti attho taṃ taṃ vijānanassa paccaya bhūtaḥ yā iva hi payogo sammā payogo ti

original: vutto. Yena hi payogena pariyesanādi nipphajjati, so tabbisayavijānanampi nipphādeti
analyzed: vuttaḥ yena hi payogena pariyesana ādi nipphajjati saḥ tad visaya vijānanam pi nipphādeti

original: nāma tadavinābhāvato. Atha vā sammāpayogaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ anvāya āgamma ābhujati
analyzed: nāma tad avinābhāvataḥ atha vā sammā payogam sammā paṭipattim anvāya āgamma ābhujati

original: samannāharati. Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: samannāharati ābhoga pubbakaḥ hi sabbaḥ api viññāṇa byāpāraḥ ti tathā vuttam

original: Gamanatoti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. Pariyesanatoti gocaragāme
analyzed: gamanato ti bhikkhā cāra vasena gocara gāmam uddissa gamanato pariyesanato ti gocara gāme

original: bhikkhatthaṃ āhiṇḍanato. Paribhogatoti āhārassa paribhuñjanato. Āsayatoti pittādiāsayato.
analyzed: bhikkha attham āhiṇḍanataḥ paribhogataḥ ti āhārassa paribhuñjanataḥ āsayataḥ ti pitta ādi āsayataḥ

original: Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: āsayati ettha ekajjham pavattamānaḥ api kamma bala vavatthitaḥ hutvā mariyāda vasena aññam aññam

original: asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo, āmāsayassa upari tiṭṭhanako pittādiko.
analyzed: asaṅkarataḥ sayati tiṭṭhati pavattati iti āsayaḥ āma āsayassa upari tiṭṭhanako pitta ādiko

original: Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro. Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti
analyzed: mariyādattho hi ayam ākāraḥ nidheti yathābhuttaḥ āhāraḥ nicitaḥ hutvā tiṭṭhati ettha ati

original: nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo, tato nidhānato. Aparipakkatoti gahaṇīsaṅkhātena kammajatejena
analyzed: nidhānam tatas nidhānataḥ a paripakkato ti gahaṇī saṅkhātena kamma ja tejena

original: avipakkato. Paripakkatoti yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipakkabhāvato. Phalatoti nipphattito.
analyzed: a vipakkato paripakkato ti yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipakka bhāvato phalato ti nipphattito

original: Nissandatoti ito cito ca vissandanato. Sammakkhanatoti sabbaso makkhanato. Ayamettha
analyzed: nissandato ti itas ca itas ca vissandanato sammakkhanato ti sabbaso makkhanato ayam ettha

original: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāya gahetabbo.
analyzed: saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana visuddhi magga saṃvaṇṇanāya gahetabbo

original: Sarīrato sedā muccantīti vegasandhāraṇena uppannapariḷāhato sarīrato sedā muccanti.
analyzed: sarīrataḥ sedāḥ muccanti iti vega sandhāraṇena uppanna pariḷāhataḥ sarīrataḥ sedāḥ muccanti

original: Aññe ca rogā kaṇṇasūlabhagandarādayo. Aṭṭhāneti manussāmanussapariggahe ayuttaṭṭhāne
analyzed: aññe ca rogā kaṇṇa sūla bhagandara ādayaḥ aṭṭhāne iti manussa amanussa pariggahe ayutta ṭṭhāne

original: khettadevāyatanādike. Kuddhā hi manussā amanussāpi vā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti. Vissaṭṭhattā
analyzed: khetta devāyatana ādike kuddhāḥ hi manussāḥ amanussāḥ api vā jīvita khayam pāpenti vissaṭṭha ttā

original: neva tassa bhikkhuno attano, kassaci anissajjitattā jigucchanīyattā ca na parassa,
analyzed: na iva tassa bhikkhuno attanaḥ kassaci a nissajjita ttā jigucchanīya ttā ca na parassa

original: udakatumbatoti veḷunāḷiādiudakabhājanato. Tanti chaḍḍitaudakaṃ.
analyzed: udaka tumbataḥ iti veḷu nāḷi ādi udaka bhājanataḥ tanti chaḍḍita audakam

original: Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato, so pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamagahaṇena.
analyzed: ettha ca ekaḥ iriyāpathaḥ dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato so pubbe abhikkama paṭikkama gahaṇena

original: “Gamanepi purato pacchato ca kāyassa abhiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahita”nti
analyzed: gamane pi puratas pacchatas ca kāyassa abhiharaṇam vuttanti idha gamanam eva gahitanti

original: apare. Yasmā idha sampajaññakathāyaṃ asammohasampajaññameva dhuraṃ, tasmā antarantare
analyzed: apare yasmai idha a sammoha sampajaññam eva dhuram tasmai antar antare

original: iriyāpathe pavattānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā
analyzed: iriyāpathe pavattānam rūpa arūpa dhammānam tattha tattha iva nirodha dassana vasena sampajāna kāri tā

original: gahitāti. Majjhimabhāṇakā pana evaṃ vadanti – eko hi bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento,
analyzed: gahitā ti majjhima bhāṇakā pana evam vadanti ekaḥ hi bhikkhu gacchantaḥ aññam cintentaḥ

original: aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva gacchati, tathā eko tiṭṭhanto,
analyzed: aññam vitakkentaḥ gacchati ekaḥ kammaṭṭhānam a vissajjetvā ava gacchati tathā ekaḥ tiṭṭhantaḥ

original: nisīdanto, sayanto aññaṃ cintento, aññaṃ vitakkento sayati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva
analyzed: nisīdantaḥ sayantaḥ aññam cintentaḥ aññam vitakkentaḥ sayati ekaḥ kammaṭṭhānam a vissajjetvā ava

original: sayati. Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti. Yo bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ
analyzed: sayati ettakena pana na pākaṭam hoti iti caṅkamanena dīpenti yaḥ bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ

original: otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti – “pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā
analyzed: otaritvā caṅkamana koṭiyam ṭhitaḥ pariggaṇhāti pācīna caṅkamana koṭiyam pavattāḥ rūpa arūpa dhammāḥ

original: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi
analyzed: pacchima caṅkamana koṭim ap patvā etthā iva niruddhā pacchima caṅkamana koṭiyam pavattā api

original: pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo
analyzed: pācīna caṅkamana koṭim ap patvā ettha iva niruddhā caṅkamana majjhe pavattāḥ ubho koṭiyaḥ

original: appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva
analyzed: a patvā ettha iva niruddhā caṅkamane pavattāḥ rūpa arūpa dhammāḥ ṭhānam a patvā ettha iva

original: niruddhā, ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ
analyzed: niruddhā ṭhāne pavattā nisajjam a patvā etthā iva niruddhā nisajjāya pavattā sayanam

original: appatvā ettheva niruddhā”ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhanto eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ
analyzed: a patvā ettha iva niruddhā iti evam pariggaṇhantaḥ pariggaṇhantaḥ eva cittam bhavaṅgam

original: otāreti, uṭṭhahanto pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva uṭṭhahati. Ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu
analyzed: otāreti uṭṭhahantaḥ pana kammaṭṭhānam gahetvā ava uṭṭhahati ayam bhikkhu gata ādīsu

original: sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
analyzed: sampajānakārī nāma hoti iti

original: Evampi sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ na kātabbaṃ, tasmā
analyzed: evam pi sutte kammaṭṭhānam avibhūtam hoti kammaṭṭhānam avibhūtam na kātabbam tasmā

original: so bhikkhu yāva sakkoti, tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā
analyzed: saḥ bhikkhu yāva sakkoti tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamānaḥ evam pariggahetvā

original: sayati – “kāyo acetano mañco acetano, kāyo na jānāti ‘ahaṃ mañce sayito’ti, mañcopi
analyzed: sayati kāyaḥ acetanaḥ mañcaḥ acetanaḥ kāyaḥ na jānāti aham mañce sayitā iti mañcaḥ upi

original: na jānāti ‘mayi kāyo sayito’ti, acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito”ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhanto
analyzed: na jānāti mayi kāyo sayito ti acetanaḥ kāyaḥ acetane mañce sayito ti evam pariggaṇhanto

original: eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, pabujjhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhatīti ayaṃ

analyzed: kesa ādi vasena tattha api vaṇṇa āditaḥ asubha ākārassa sabbasas dassana vasena pavattam kāya vicchandanīya kathanti

original: attano parassa ca karajakāye vicchandanuppādanakathaṃ. Muttaṃ vātiādinā byatirekamukhena
analyzed: attano parassa ca karaja kāye vicchanda nuppādana katham muttam vāti ādinā byatireka mukhena

original: kāyassa amanuññataṃ dasseti. Tattha ādito tīhi padehi adassanīyatāya asārakatāya
analyzed: kāyassa amanuñña tam dasseti tattha āditaḥ tīhi padehi a dassanīya tāya asāraka tāya

original: ca, majjhe catūhi duggandhatāya, ante ekena lesamattenapi manuññatābhāvamassa dasseti.
analyzed: ca majjhe catūhi duggandha tāya ante ekena lesa mattena api manuñña tā bhāvam assa dasseti

original: Atha khotiādinā anvayato sarūpeneva amanuññatāya dassanaṃ. “Kesalomādī”ti saṅkhepato
analyzed: atha kho ti ādinā anvayato sarūpena iva amanuñña tāya dassanam kesa loma ādi iti saṅkhepato

original: vuttamatthaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “yepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam attham vibhāgena dassetum ye pi itiādi vuttam

original: Vaṇṇentoti vitthārento. Asubhāyāti asubhamātikāya. Phātikammanti bahulīkāro. Kilesacorehi anabhibhavanīyattā jhānaṃ “cittamañjūsa”nti vuttaṃ. Nissāyāti pādakaṃ katvā.
analyzed: vaṇṇento ti vitthārento asubhāya ati asubha mātikāya phāti kammanti bahulīkāro kilesa corehi an abhibhavanīya ttā jhānam citta mañjūsanti vuttam nissāya ati pādakam katvā

original: Apare pana “tasmiṃ kira addhamāse na koci buddhaveneyyo ahosi, tasmā bhagavā evamāha
analyzed: apare pana tasmin kira addha māse na koci buddha veneyyaḥ ahosi tasmai bhagavā evam āha

analyzed: icchāmaham bhikkhave tiādi iti vadanti pare kira ati kira saddaḥ aruci saṃsūcana atthaḥ

original: Tenāha “idaṃ pana icchāmatta”nti.
analyzed: tena āha idam pana

original: sannipatitabhikkhūsu bahūnaṃ sappāyā sātthikā ca, tasmā puna gahitā. Tathā hi bhagavā

original: Vesāliṃ upanissāyāti vesālīnagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā. Muhuttenevāti satthari saddhamme
analyzed: vesālim upanissāya ati vesālī nagaram gocara gāmam katvā muhuttena iva ati satthari saddhamme

original: Ānāpānapariggāhikāyāti assāsapassāse pariggaṇhanavasena pavattāya satiyā. Sampayutto
analyzed: āna apāna pariggāhikāya ati assāsa passāse pariggaṇhana vasena pavattāya satiyā sampayuttaḥ

analyzed: sattannam pi paccayānam vasena paccaya bhāvam dasseti yathā paṭipannāḥ me sāvakā cattāro

original: satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”tiādīsu uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanāti vuccatīti tadubhayavasena
analyzed: satipaṭṭhāne bhāventi itiādīsu uppādana vaḍḍhana ṭṭhena bhāvanā ati vuccati iti tad ubhaya vasena

original: atthaṃ dassento “bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā”ti āha. Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ
analyzed: attham dassentaḥ bhāvito ti uppāditaḥ vaḍḍhitaḥ vā ti āha tattha bhāvam vijjamāna tam

original: ito gatoti bhāvito, uppādito paṭiladdhamattoti attho. Uppanno pana laddhāsevano bhāvito,
analyzed: itas gataḥ ti bhāvitaḥ uppādito paṭiladdha matto ti attho uppannaḥ pana laddha āsevanaḥ bhāvito

original: paguṇabhāvaṃ āpādito vaḍḍhitoti attho. Bahulīkatoti bahulaṃ pavattito. Tena āvajjanādivasībhāvappattimāha.
analyzed: paguṇa bhāvam āpāditaḥ vaḍḍhito ti attho bahulīkato ti bahulam pavattitaḥ tena āvajjana ādivasībhāva ppattim āha

original: Yo hi vasībhāvamāpādito, so icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjitabbato punappunaṃ pavattissati.

original: Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ kato”ti. Yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, vivicceva kāmehī”ti

original: “ayaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ayam hi itiādi vuttam

original: Asubhakammaṭṭhānanti asubhārammaṇaṃ jhānamāha. Tañhi asubhesu yogakammabhāvato yogino

original: vuccati. Oḷārikārammaṇattāti bībhacchārammaṇattā. Paṭikūlārammaṇattāti jigucchitabbārammaṇattā.

original: Pariyāyenāti kāraṇena, lesantarena vā. Ārammaṇasantatāyāti anukkamena vicitabbataṃ

analyzed: patta ārammaṇassa parama sukhuma tam sandhāya āha santehi sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno

analyzed: atthaḥ ārammaṇa santatāya tad ārammaṇānam dhammānam santatā lokuttara dhamma ārammaṇāhi

analyzed: paccavekkhaṇāhi veditabbā

analyzed: attanaḥ pavatti kkhaṇena iva antaradhāpeti iti ettha antaradhāpanam vināsanam tam pana

original: Vūpasametīti visesena upasameti. Visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti

original: 10. Kimilasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kimila sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 986. Theroti ānandatthero. Ayaṃ desanāti “kathaṃ vibhāvito nu kho kimilā”tiādinā

original: Desanāsīsanti desanāpadesaṃ. Manasikārapadesena vedanā vuttāti taṃ sabbaṃ sarūpato

analyzed: aññā apadesataḥ apadisati yathā iva hi itiādinā tattha nidassanam dasseti citta saṅkhāra pada dvaya iti

original: “cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāra”nti etasmiṃ padadvaye.

original: Evaṃ santepīti pītimanasikāracittasaṅkhārapadesena yadi vedanā vuttā, evaṃ santepi.
analyzed: evam sante api iti pīti manasikāra citta saṅkhāra padesena yadi vedanā vuttā evam sante api

original: Esā yathāvuttā vedanā ārammaṇaṃ na hoti. Vedanārammaṇā ca anupassanā, tasmā vedanānupassanā
analyzed: esā yathā vuttā vedanā ārammaṇam na hoti vedanā ārammaṇā ca anupassanā tasmā vedanā anupassanā

original: na yujjati. Yadi evaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsu “vedanā vediyatī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti
analyzed: na yujjati yadi evam mahā sati paṭṭhāna ādīsu vedanā vediyati iti vuttam tam kathan ti

original: āha – “mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsupī”tiādi. Tattha sukhādīnaṃ vatthunti sukhādīnaṃ uppattiyā
analyzed: āha mahāsati paṭṭhāna ādīsu pi itiādi tattha sukha ādīnam vatthum ti sukha ādīnam uppattiyā

original: vatthubhūtaṃ rūpasaddādiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanā vediyati, na puggalo puggalasseva
analyzed: vatthu bhūtam rūpa sadda ādim ārammaṇam katvā vedanā na puggalaḥ puggalassa iva

original: abhāvato. Vedanāppavattiṃ upādāya nissāya yathā “puggalo vedanaṃ vediyatī”ti vohāramattaṃ
analyzed: abhāvataḥ vedanā appavattim upādāya nissāya yathā puggalaḥ vedanam vediyati iti vohāra mattam

analyzed: hoti evam idha api vedanāya assāsa passāse ārabbha pavatti tathā pavatta manasikāra sīsena

original: “vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatī”ti vutto. Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ
analyzed: vedanāsu vedanā anupassī bhikkhu tasmin samaye viharati iti vuttaḥ tam sandhāya ati tam

original: vedanāya ārammaṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya. Ādīnaṃ padānaṃ. Etassa “vedanānupassanā na yujjatī”ti vuttaanuyogassa.
analyzed: vedanāya ārammaṇa bhāvam sandhāya ādīnam padānam etassa vedanā anupassanā na yujjati iti vutta anuyogassa

original: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjatīti pītisahagatāni paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni paṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati iti pīti sahagatāni paṭhama dutiya jhānāni paṭipāṭiyā

analyzed: samāpajjati tassa ati tena paṭisaṃvidita sadda apekkhāya hi kattu atthe etam sāmi vacanam

original: Samāpattikkhaṇeti samāpajjanakkhaṇe. Jhānapaṭilābhenāti jhānena samaṅgībhāvena. Ārammaṇatoti
analyzed: samāpatti khaṇe iti samāpajjana kkhaṇe jhāna paṭilābhena ati jhānena samaṅgībhāvena ārammaṇato ti

original: ārammaṇamukhena tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, ārammaṇassa

original: paṭisaṃviditattāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye
analyzed: paṭisaṃvidita ttā iti vuttam hoti yathā nāma sappa pariyesanam carantena tassa āsaye

original: paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃvidito hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā,
analyzed: paṭisaṃvidite saḥ api paṭisaṃviditaḥ hoti mantā gada balena tassa gahaṇassa sukara ttā

original: evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditāva hoti salakkhaṇato
analyzed: evam pītiyāḥ āsaya bhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā ava hoti sa lakkhaṇato

original: sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattā. Vipassanakkhaṇeti vipassanāpaññāya
analyzed: sāmañña lakkhaṇato ca tassāḥ gahaṇassa sukara ttā vipassana kkhaṇā iti vipassanā paññāya

original: tikkhavisadabhāvappattāya visayato dassanakkhaṇe. Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhenāti pītiyā salakkhaṇassa
analyzed: tikkha visada bhāva ppattāya visayataḥ dassana kkhaṇe lakkhaṇa ppaṭivedhena ati pītiyā sa lakkhaṇassa

original: sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena. Yañhi pītiyā visesato sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: sāmañña lakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena yat hi pītiyāḥ visesataḥ sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇam

original: tasmiṃ vidite sā yāthāvato viditā eva hoti. Tenāha “asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotī”ti.
analyzed: tasmin vidite sā yāthāvataḥ viditā eva hoti tena āha a sammohataḥ pi iti paṭisaṃviditā hoti iti

original: Idāni tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva vibhāvetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Tattha dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti
analyzed: idāni tam attham pāḷiyā eva vibhāvetum vuttam ha etat ti ādim āha tattha dīgham assāsa vasena ati

original: dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena. Pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti
analyzed: dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇa bhūtassa vasena pajānato sā pi iti paṭisaṃviditā hoti iti

original: sambandho. Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ “avikkhepo”ti
analyzed: sambandhaḥ cittassa ekagga tam avikkhepam pajānato ti jhāna pariyāpannam avikkhepaḥ ti

original: laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato. Yathā hi ārammaṇamukhena

original: pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā
analyzed: pi iti paṭisaṃviditā hoti evam tad sampayutta dhammā api ārammaṇa mukhena paṭisaṃviditā

original: eva hontīti. Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tasmiṃ
analyzed: eva honti iti sati upaṭṭhitā hoti iti dīgham assāsa vasena jhāna sampayuttā sati tasmiṃ

original: ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hoti. Tāya satiyāti evaṃ

original: upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā ārammaṇassa tassa

original: vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Dīghaṃ passāsavasenātiādīsupi imināva

original: nayena attho veditabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbānī”ti.
analyzed: nayena atthaḥ veditabbo tena vuttam etena iva nayena avasesa padāni pi atthataḥ veditabbāni iti

original: Yathevātiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – jhānapaṭilābhena yathā ārammaṇato pītiādayo paṭisaṃviditā

original: honti tena vinā tesaṃ appavattanato. Evaṃ jhānasampayuttena taṃpariyāpannena vedanāsaṅkhātamanasikārapaṭilābhena

original: pubbe vuttacodanaṃ nirākaroti.

original: Soti dhammānupassanaṃ anuyutto bhikkhu. Yaṃ taṃ pahānaṃ pahāyakañāṇaṃ. Paññāyāti

989-996. Aniccādivasenāti aniccadukkhānattavasena. Pavicinati pakārehi vicinati. Nikkilesāti apagatakilesā vikkhambhitakilesā. Pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgoti pāṭho.
